title: Effect of PCBM nanoparticles in lead-based layered (PEA)2PbI4 perovskite thin films
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,2328-2334
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00338A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Deepak Aloysius, Muskan Khan, Arindam Mondal, Satyajit Gupta
Two-dimensional (2D) layered halide perovskites are considered to be one of the future potential semiconductor materials due to their higher moisture stability. The study shows the effect of PCBM nanoparticles in 2D layered perovskites.
